data.title: Office rental rates in Silom-Sathorn-Rama IV area up in Q3
data.description: Office-building market in Q3 2024 driven by  significant increase in supply and  rise in leasing activity

data.title: Need for homes for elderly rises as Thailand becomes aged society
data.description: Demand for nursing homes and residences for the elderly has surged as Thailand has entered an aged society, according to results of a survey by the Real Estate Information Centre (REIC) released on Sunday.

data.title: Pichai discusses economic cooperation, FTA with UK ambassador
data.description: Discussions emphasised mutual commitment to expanding trade and investment

data.title: Cool seasonal weather attracts tourists to Mae Hong Son
data.description: Tourists have been flocking to the Pang Ung reservoir and Ban Rak Thai village in Mae Hong Son province to experience cool weather at temperatures around 12-14 degrees Celsius.

data.title: Drug trafficker arrested in southern Thailand with assault rifle, speed pills
data.description: NAKHON SI THAMMARAT: A man, 39, was arrested in Thung Song district of this southern Thai province with an assault rifle, 95 bullets, and 111 speed pills. Police believe the man is a major drug dealer.

data.title: Poor-quality steel bars worth over THB200m seized from Thai factory
data.description: The Industry Ministry cracked down on a Thai steel bar factory in Si Racha district of  Chonburi province, confiscating poor-quality steel bars worth over 200 million baht.

data.title: NIDA Poll reveals results of survey on constitutional amendments
data.description: Findings include public opinions on referendum thresholds and preferences for charter changes

data.title: Over 56% of Thais expect to travel during the New Year holidays
data.description: Nearly 60% want cash handouts as NY gift from government to stimulate the economy and tourism

data.title: SAM's Vision: Boosting Thailand's role in aerospace and semiconductor equipment
data.description: Join us for an exclusive interview with Mr. Peter Lim, CEO of SAM Engineering & Equipment Berhad, as he shares his strategic vision for driving growth in the aerospace and semiconductor sectors.

data.title: Pita reaches out to Ubon Ratchathani voters for PAO chief election
data.description: Former Move Forward Party leader Pita Limjaroenrat asked Ubon Ratchathani province locals to turn out in large numbers and cast their ballots for their preferred Provincial Administrative Organisation (PAO) presidential candidate.

data.title: On these apps, the dark promise of mothers sexually abusing children
data.description: The promotional photo showed a mother affectionately hugging and kissing her daughter. The girl, around 8 years old, smiled into the camera.

data.title: Tourists turn out in full force at Doi Pui for overnight stay
data.description: Cool mornings, breathtaking scenery a big draw on Doi Suthep

data.title: Seven traffic policemen suspended over alleged assault
data.description: Seven traffic policemen faced temporary suspension from their duties for physically assaulting innocent people, according to an order signed by Traffic Police chief Pol Maj-General Surachet Bandit on Friday.

data.title: Snowfall in Europe drying up as climate change take a toll
data.description: Snowfall declined sharply after 1980, coinciding with a rapid rise in temperatures, says study

data.title: South Korea arrests ex-defence minister over martial law: Yonhap News
data.description: SEOUL: South Korean prosecutors on Sunday arrested ex-Defence Minister Kim Yong-hyun over his alleged role in President Yoon Suk Yeol

data.title: US House to vote to provide $3bn to remove Chinese telecoms equipment
data.description: WASHINGTON: The US House of Representatives is set to vote next week on an annual defense bill that includes just over $3 billion for U.S. telecom companies to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.

data.title: Rebels enter Damascus, threatening Assad’s rule
data.description: Rebel fighters began to enter the Syrian capital, Damascus, on Sunday, taking them to the brink of a stunning victory as Syrian forces and their leader, President Bashar Assad, appeared to be fleeing.

data.title: Temperatures to drop 1-4 degrees in most parts of Thailand
data.description: Temperatures in all areas of Thailand except the South will drop by 1-4 degrees Celsius early this week due to a high pressure system from China, according to the Meteorological Department.

data.title: Doctor who donated his body for research wins plaudits
data.description: Krittai Thanasombatkul, a medical doctor who became a best-selling author about maintaining his fighting spirit as he battled last-stage lung cancer, received praise among people even though he passed away last year.

data.title: South Korean prosecutors detain ex-defense chief over martial law imposition
data.description: South Korean prosecutors on Sunday detained a former defense minister who allegedly recommended last week’s brief but stunning martial law imposition to President Yoon Suk Yeol, making him the first figure detained over the case, news reports said.

data.title: Thailand’s rice yields considerably lower than other countries
data.description: Department of Rice sees high potential to promote coloured varieties

data.title: Confident Thais eye win in Asean football opener
data.description: Thailand may be missing many of their key players but they remain confident of kicking off the defence of their Asean championship title with a victory over Timor Leste at Hang Day Stadium in Vietnam Sunday night.

data.title: US unveils $988m aid package for Ukraine including rockets and drones
data.description: SIMI VALLEY, California: The United States unveiled a $988 million aid package of new arms and equipment to Ukraine for its ongoing fight against Russia

data.title: Five arrested in central Thailand with 6.4m speed pills destined for South
data.description: PATHUM THANI: Police arrested five suspects at a rented house in Lam Luk Ka district of this central Thai province with 6.4 million methamphetamine pills en route for distribution in the South.

data.title: Thai government gets flak over flood management
data.description: The administration of Prime Minister  Paetongtarn Shinawatra  has come under heavy criticism over its handling of the  flood  crisis in the four southern border provinces of Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat and Songkhla.

data.title: Bangkok among the ‘best cities in Southeast Asia’ for tourists
data.description: Indian news channel names region’s top cities

data.title: Syrian insurgents claim entry into Damascus; residents report gunfire sounds
data.description: Syrian insurgents said early Sunday that they had entered Damascus, capping a stunning advance across the country, as residents of the capital reported sounds of gunfire and explosions.

data.title: US House to vote to provide $3 billion to remove Chinese telecoms equipment
data.description: WASHINGTON: The US House of Representatives is set to vote next week on an annual defense bill that includes just over $3 billion for U.S. telecom companies to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.

data.title: Busy young professionals in China turn to sport to boost social circles
data.description: Among these sports, cycling is growing as a popular choice.
